title: 2 Free promo wins?
body: When i've lost a promos and then when i'll come back to it with 90+ lp bonus win, do i get 2 win bonus to my promos when i get to them again? {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Only if ur in promos for the second time from 1 div to another. Bronze-silver silver-gold etc...
Yeah i fell once from my promos from Silver 1 to Gold 5, and i have 99 lp now so if ill win now, will i have the 2 free promo wins?

> [{quoted}](name=Marapèy,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=laWQ3mni,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-13T11:15:15.439+0000)
>
> Yeah i fell once from my promos from Silver 1 to Gold 5, and i have 99 lp now so if ill win now, will i have the 2 free promo wins?

Correct
